---
title: "SessionStartRequest"
description: ""
---



## Fields

<ParamField path="headless" type="bool" default="False">
  Whether to run the session in headless mode.
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="solve_captchas" type="bool" default="False">
  Whether to try to automatically solve captchas
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="timeout_minutes" type="int" default="3">
  Session timeout in minutes. Cannot exceed the global timeout.
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="proxies" type="UnionType[list[Annotated[UnionType[NotteProxy, ExternalProxy], annotation=NoneType required=True discriminator='type']], bool]" default="False">
  List of custom proxies to use for the session. If True, the default proxies will be used.
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="browser_type" type="Literal['chromium', 'chrome', 'firefox']" default="chromium">
  The browser type to use. Can be chromium, chrome or firefox.
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="user_agent" type="UnionType[str, None]">
  The user agent to use for the session
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="chrome_args" type="UnionType[list[str], None]" required>
  Overwrite the chrome instance arguments
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="viewport_width" type="UnionType[int, None]">
  The width of the viewport
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="viewport_height" type="UnionType[int, None]">
  The height of the viewport
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="cdp_url" type="UnionType[str, None]">
  The CDP URL of another remote session provider.
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="use_file_storage" type="bool" default="False">
  Whether FileStorage should be attached to the session.
</ParamField>


## Module

`notte_sdk.types`
